mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_dimension_item (id, dimension_id, dimension_item_code, dimension_item_name, enabled, version_number, start_date, created_date, last_updated_date, created_by, last_updated_by, start_date) SELECT t.id, t.dimension_id, t.dimension_item_code, t.dimension_item_name, enabled, 1, #{currentDate}, #{currentDate}, #{currentDate}, #{userId}, #{userId}, #{currentDate} FROM sys_dimension_item_temp t WHERE t.batch_number = #{transactionID} AND t.error_flag = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_dimension_item_temp t SET t.error_flag = 1, t.error_detail = concat(error_detail, ' 维度代码已经存在，不允许重复导入！') WHERE 1 < (SELECT 1 FROM sys_dimension_item_temp temp WHERE temp.dimension_id = t.dimension_id AND temp.batch_number = #{batchNumber} AND temp.dimension_item_code = t.dimension_item_code) AND t.batch_number = #{batchNumber}
mapper.select: select (select count(0) as successEntities from sys_dimension_item_temp where batch_number = #{transactionID} and error_flag = 0) as successEntities, (select count(0) as failureEntities from sys_dimension_item_temp where batch_number = #{transactionID} and error_flag = 1) as failureEntities, #{transactionID} as transaction_id from dual

select t.row_number AS row_number, t.error_detail AS error FROM sys_dimension_item_temp t
WHERE t.batch_number = #{transactionID} and t.error_flag = 1
